lead_paragraph: Shares of SS&C Technologies Holdings remained almost flat in their market debut after the company raised $160.9 million in its initial public offering, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Shares of SS&C Technologies Holdings remained almost flat in their market debut after the company raised $160.9 million in its initial public offering, The Associated Press reported.
